topic.title: Enroll a User from This Site in This Conference
topic.section: By selecting "Enroll a User from This Site in This Conference" under Users on Current Conferences page, what we get to is the same as the link "Enroll Existing User" on All Users page. The Conference Manager can first select a role to be assigned, then check a user name and click "Enrolled Selected Users", or directly click "Enroll User" next to the name of a user.
